**"Roar" by Katy Perry**: This empowering anthem would symbolize my growth and transformation. It would capture the moment when I found the courage to speak up, assert myself, and overcome my fears. The song's uplifting melody would embody my journey towards self-acceptance and confidence.

**"Fast Car" by Tracy Chapman**: This poignant ballad would represent my longing for freedom and escape from the constraints of my past. Its haunting melody would evoke the sense of restlessness and discontent that drove me to seek change and pursue my dreams.

**"Viva la Vida" by Coldplay**: This epic song would represent the grandeur and complexity of my life's journey. Its sweeping orchestration and thought-provoking lyrics would capture the essence of my struggles, triumphs, and the lessons I've learned along the way.

**"Landslide" by Fleetwood Mac**: This timeless classic would represent the transformative power of change and growth. Its poignant lyrics would reflect my struggles to adapt to new circumstances, let go of the past, and find my place in the world. The song's soothing melody would embody the sense of peace and acceptance that comes with embracing the unknown. [/INST]
